thread.title: Chic welcoming style
thread.title_full: Chic welcoming style - Review of Hotel Therese, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: sonianuk
title: Chic welcoming style
text:
Effortless style, genuinely skilled hospitality staff showing exemplary service at all time. Having stayed on three occasions, each time in different rooms, all were beautifully designed rooms. The entire hotel is immaculate from the entrance onwards.
Room Tip: On my most recent stay, I was on level 3 and in a large room. I know this will sound odd but the bas... See more room tips
